Articles.Content: I have a discord server where my friend can request spacecraft and one of my friends edit them. The issue is the edits have the hud open because I need it to fly. Is there a way i could make more cinematic footage for my friend to work with, while still being able to fly my craft? Because the hud really make the videos look bad.

You could try setting the HUD to its smallest setting, and then cropping it out of the footage. You could also just turn the HUD off for short stretches of time, and then stitch together footage from a bunch of different flights.
